title: Fix: exclude test files from npm tarball (tsconfig.build.json)
description: HIGH BUG from QA (TASK-030): 44 test files leak into npm tarball because tsc compiles __tests__ dirs into dist/. Fix: create tsconfig.build.json that excludes test patterns, update package.json build script to use it (tsc -p tsconfig.build.json). Verify with npm pack that tarball only contains production dist files. Update files field in package.json if needed.
